name: Kiran.github.io
body:
I am a programmer, former electrical engineer, armchair science enthusiast, amateur tailor, and tiny amigurumi maker.

As the introduction implies, I tend to flip between hobbies as I discover new things I want to make, duty cycling each constantly. I really enjoy being slightly competent at a wide variety of things -- in the last year, Iâ€™ve started a container vegetable garden, learned how to swim and scuba dive, switched to a systems engineering role at work, bought my first raspberry pi and programmed an LED sign, and learned how to design and woodwork a set of drawers.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
